user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) the additional information I requested for his job application, including his updated resume, professional references, and any recent certifications or awards. Remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Additional Application Materials

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well.

To complete your application for the position at Tech Innovations Inc., could you please send the following items at your earliest convenience?

• Your updated résumé  
• A list of professional references (with contact information)  
• Copies of any recent certifications or awards

Kindly email the documents to me at sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com.  
If it’s helpful, you can find the relevant files in your Gmail or Notion workspace.

Thank you very much for your prompt attention. Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
HR Representative  
Tech Innovations Inc.
